title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-6.6 - Go-kart track surfaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-6.6 - Go-kart track surfaces

State Regulations

Go-kart tracks shall be designed so that: (a) the paths do not cross at any
location; (b) surfaces are: (1)
hard and smooth; (2)
free of ruts, holes, and bumps; (i) dirt go-kart tracks shall be compacted
and free of loose stones; (c) loading and unloading areas are: (1)
clearly designated; (2)
graded; and
(3)
free of tripping hazards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-6.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
